data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 51,285 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Haut-Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Haut-Lomami.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 51,285 believers in the state of Haut-Lomami with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 215,515 people in Haut-Lomami who are far from you. Please add 53 new house churches this year.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Haut-Lomami.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Haut-Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Haut-Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.focus_label: Haut-Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Haut-Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 266,800.

We estimate Haut-Lomami has 51,285 people who might know Jesus, 193,229 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22,286 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
